tags.name: CostAllocationRules
tags.description: An API for creating and managing cost allocation rules within a billing account or enterprise enrollment. These rules can be used to reallocate cost between resources, filtered by Resource Group, Subscription, or Tag.

get.description: Get the list of all cost allocation rules for a billing account or enterprise enrollment.

200.description: List of cost allocation rules for the billing account.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

post.description: Check if a given rule name is in use

parameters.name: costAllocationRuleCheckNameAvailabilityRequest
parameters.description: Cost allocation rule to be created/updated

200.description: Response of cost allocation rule name availability.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.description: Get a cost allocation rule by rule name and billing account or enterprise enrollment.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create/Update a rule to allocate cost between different resources within a billing account or enterprise enrollment.

parameters.name: costAllocationRule
parameters.description: Cost allocation rule to be created/updated

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Delete cost allocation rule for billing account or enterprise enrollment.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

RuleStatus.description: Current status of the rule. The rule must be active to change billed values. Processing indicates that a saved change has not yet been applied to your account.

InputRuleStatus.description: Current status of the rule. The rule must be active to change billed values.

CostAllocationRuleDetails.description: Resource details of the cost allocation rule

sourceResources.description: Source resources for cost allocation. Only one type of resource can be used for sourcing cost per rule, so this list can contain no more than one element.

targetResources.description: Target resources for cost allocation. Only one type of resource can be used for targeting cost per rule, so this list can contain no more than one element.

CostAllocationResource.description: Common values for resources for cost allocation

resourceType.description: Type of resources contained in this cost allocation rule

name.description: If resource type is dimension, this must be either ResourceGroupName or SubscriptionId. If resource type is tag, this must be a valid Azure tag

values.description: Source Resources for cost allocation. This list cannot contain more than 25 values.
Target resources for cost allocation. This list cannot contain more than 25 values.

policyType.description: Method of cost allocation for the rule

CostAllocationResourceType.description: Category of resource to use for allocation. Dimension indicates cost for either a resource group or subscription is being changed. Tag allocates cost based on Azure Tag key value pairs.

percentage.description: Percentage of source cost to allocate to this resource. This value can be specified to two decimal places and the total percentage of all resources in this rule must sum to 100.00.

CostAllocationPolicyType.description: Method to use for allocating cost. FixedProportion indicates that cost will be split based on specified percentage values.

billingAccountIdParameter.description: Billing Account ID or Enrollment Number

ruleNameParameter.description: Cost allocation rule name. The name cannot include spaces or any non alphanumeric characters other than '_' and '-'. The max length is 260 characters.
